medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the beginning of the message and to transmit identifying number (e.g. Master B/L, Master AWB etc.), type, date and the function of the message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify date/time of the document/message.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary total associated to the whole consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to give information and/or processable instructions in addition to that in other segments.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to specify totals of the consolidation (e.g. total number of equipment, total number of consignments, total gross weight and/or dimensions of the whole consolidation etc.).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments containing references and constants which apply to the entire message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to give information about the current customs procedure under which the transport is moving or to indicate applicable governmental procedures related to import, export and transit of the voyage/flight or consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Governmental requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GOR, A segment to give information about the current customs procedure under which the transport is moving or to indicate applicable governmental procedures to import, export and transit of the voyage/flight or consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) related to documents and/ or customs- and/or governmental procedures (e.g. date of issuing of customs document, expiration date of customs document etc.).

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify locations associated with customs- and/or governmental-procedures (e.g. customs office of exit, customs office of destination etc.).

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seals and seal issuer associated with the customs procedure and/or customs document specified in this segment group.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify additional governmental requirements information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to indicate document(s) required.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to indicate document(s) required by government or related to a specified customs- and/or other governmental procedure and/or accompanying goods.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date/time related to the indicated document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify a party and related contacts and references.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address and function.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to identify a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within the party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify a reference related to the party, and its associated dates and/or times.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and/or time associated to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to specify charges associated with the transport of the consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify a charge.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilogram).

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify an amount associated with the charges and/or related to the transport of the consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate locations related to a charge (e.g. beginning and/or end of a chargeable section).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to describe all transport details of the voyage/flight or consolidation and of all parties involved.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to a certain stage of the transport, such as mode, means, type of means of transport, carrier, voyage/flight number, etc.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment to identify contract, conditions of carriage, services and priority requirements for this stage of the transport of the consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating relevant locations related to the transport of the consolidation (e.g. place of loading, place of discharge, transhipment place etc.) dependent on the transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment indicating pertinent date(s) and time(s) (e.g. date of departure/arrival etc.) dependent on the transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seals and seal issuer associated with the means of transport in the transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable instructions regarding mode, means of transport, transhipment, unloading, direct delivery, new documentation etc. related to the specified transport stage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments indicating relevant weights.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment indicating relevant weights of the means of transport used in the specified transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment indicating the number of transportable units related to the information in the segment MEA.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments indicating relevant dimensions.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment indicating relevant dimensions of the means of transport used in the specified transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment indicating the number of transportable units related to the information in the segment DIM.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to indicate relevant contacts.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a relevant department and/or person related to the carrier specified in the segment TDT.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment indicating the communication channel and the relevant communication number of the department or persons.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments to specify the parties related to the specified transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify the names and addresses of the parties which are loading, sending, consolidating, unloading, acting as transhipment agent, break bulk agent, etc. related to the specified transport stage.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate any location relevant to the party specified in the segment NAD.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments to indicate contacts related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a relevant department and/or person related to the party specified in the segment NAD.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment indicating the communication channel and the relevant communication number of the department or persons mentioned in segment CTA.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments to specify a document related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to identify a document required or accompanying goods of, by, or for the party specified in the segment NAD.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date/time related to the required document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments to specify charges associated with the party.

medi:segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify a charge associated with the party.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilogram).

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify an amount associated with the charges and/or related to the transport of the consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments to specify a reference related to the party, and its associated dates and/or times.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date and/or time associated with the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: FTX-SG18 A group of segments to specify equipment in which consignments are transported (e.g. trailer, railway wagon, ULD, etc.). This segment group WILL NOT be used in the deep sea context. This is because EQD in this context is used to define an extended transport such as a trailer attached to a truck, containers attached to a trailer etc. Containers in the deep sea context ARE NOT part of an extended definition of transport but are considered as integral with the consignment and are thus described at the consignment level.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify equipment, and equipment size and type used for the transport of the consolidation.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of pieces of equipment of the same size and type if the equipment number in the segment EQD is not specified (Composite C237).

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify transport details for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Transport movement details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details for the equipment named in segment EQD.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify weights associated with the equipment named in segment EQD which are not indicated in the segment EQD.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions associated with the equipment named in segment EQD which are not indicated in the segment EQD.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to specify seals and seal issuer associated with the equipment named in segment EQD.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify parties associated with the equipment named in segment EQD (e.g. owner of the equipment, party to which the empty equipment has to be delivered etc.).

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify locations associated with the party and/or the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions for specified equipment.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment to specify a temperature setting for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable instructions associated with the equipment named in segment EQD (e.g. instructions related to the delivery of the empty equipment after unloading of the consignments etc.).

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments to identify attached or related equipment.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment to identify attached and/or related equipment such as chassis attached to a container.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of pieces of equipment named in the segment EQA attached to the equipment named in the segment EQD.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation:
Segment group 19: FTX-SG24-SG25-SG26-SG27-SG29-SG30-SG31-SG34- SG41-SG60 A segment group to give information about all consignments included in a voyage/flight or consolidation. The segment group can be used in two different manners to serve different approaches to consolidate messages:
- Short form consolidation message
In this situation, single consignment based functional messages (e.g. booking and/or instruction messages) have been sent on a progressive basis between exchanging partners (e.g. freight forwarder on the export side to freight forwarder on the import side). When the loading of the vessel/aircraft or consolidation is complete the IFCSUM-message will be sent and will use the CNI-segments to identify the transport document/message number (e.g. bill of lading, air-way bill, etc.) of every consignment, the details of which have already been sent as separate single consignment based messages (e.g. booking and/or instruction messages) or which will be sent as separate single consignment based messages following the IFCSUM-message using the option of grouping with the UNG-service-segment in a transmission. When the carrier himself loads consignments in a container or ULD the segment SGP and/or TPL following the CNI can be used to indicate in which equipment specified in the EQD-group on top level and/or which means of transport specified in the TDT-group on top level the consignment is loaded.
Thus the short form IFCSUM-message operates as a reconciliation and control statement.
- Extended form consolidation message
In this situation, the data for each individual consignment has NOT been sent to the receiving partner by means of single consignment based messages (e.g. booking and/or instruction messages) separate to the IFCSUM message. In these circumstances it is possible to include the details of each consignment into the IFCSUM-message. In that case the segment (group) SGP and TPL following the segment CNI will not be used. For every consignment the complete structure of a single consignment based message can be used starting with the segment CNI replacing the BGM.
Thus the extended form IFCSUM-message has not the function of referencing but to show as full a set of consignment data as is necessary to meet the requirements of type of consolidation message being constructed, e.g. Cargo vs. Full Freight.

medi:segment.name: Consignment information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNI, A segment to indicate consignments included in the consolidation using the transport document/message number or to replace the segment BGM of a single consignment based message structure.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments to specify the distribution of a consignment among the transport equipment. This segment group will only be used when no other segments follow after this SGP-group.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the equipment in which a consignment is loaded.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments to identify measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of that portion of the consignment in the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segments to identify transport details and associated measurements for this consignment. This group may be repeated to indicate the different phases of the movement.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify transport details for the consignment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments to identify measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the distribution of the consignment among the transport details.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate a date and time applying to the whole consignment, e.g., date and time of document issue.

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment to specify totals for a consignment.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment to identify the contract, conditions of carriage, services, and priority requirements for the transport.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to indicate default currencies and exchange rates.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to indicate a monetary value for entire consignment, e.g. insured value, invoice amount, disbursements, etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free form or processable supplementary information, such as status of transport, remarks to be printed on the transport documents (where required), consignment remarks, insurance instructions, etc., or any other additional information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 24: A group of segments to specify locations and related date(s)/time(s) which apply to the entire consignment, e.g. place of transhipment.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify a location applying to the entire consignment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date(s) and time(s) relating to the location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 25: A group of segments to specify terms of delivery and related locations.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment to specify the applicable terms of delivery.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify a location related to the terms of delivery.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 26: A group of segments containing a reference and constants which apply to the entire consignment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to express a reference which applies to the entire consignment such as: the document/message number that is to be updated by this very message (according to data element 1225 Message Function, Coded in segment BGM), booking reference, order number, insurance contract, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 27: A group of segments to identify customs and other governmental procedures and required documents.

medi:segment.name: Governmental requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GOR, A segment to indicate applicable governmental procedures related to import, export and transport of the goods.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time related to documents and/or customs- and/or governmental procedures for the consignment (e.g. date of issuing of customs document, expiration date of customs document etc.).

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify locations associated with customs- and/or governmental procedures for this consignment (e.g. customs office of exit, customs office of destination etc.).

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seals and seal issuer associated with the customs procedure and/or customs document for this consignment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide supplementary governmental requirements information for this consignment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 28: A group of segments to specify required documents by government.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to indicate a document required by government.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date/time related to the required document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 29: A group of segments to indicate charge methodology which applies to the entire consignment.

medi:segment.name: Charge payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CPI, A segment to indicate default charge methodology.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to indicate a reference relating to the CPI segment, such as charge reference number.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the payment currency related to the charge methodology.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the place of charge collection.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to identify the monetary amount associated with the charges.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 30: A group of segments to specify charge calculations associated with the transport.

medi:segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify charge.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information associated with charge.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify currencies associated with charge.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilograms).

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 31: A group of segments to indicate details of the movement of goods such as mode and means of transport, locations, departure, and arrival date(s) and time(s).

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment to indicate information related to a certain stage of the transport, such as mode, means and carrier.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate departure/arrival date and time.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment to identify contract, conditions of carriage, services, priority requirements for this stage of transport.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 32: A group of segments to specify a location and date/time related to this leg of transport.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate a location such as origin, destination, stop off, etc. related to this leg of transport.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify a date/time related to the location, such as arrival date/time of a means of transport at a specific location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 33: A group of segments to specify an additional reference related to the stage of the transport.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to specify an additional reference.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 34: A group of segments to identify a party, related references, locations contacts, required documents, and charges to be paid by the party.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the party's name, address, and function.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate location where a specific function will be performed.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to identify the monetary amount associated with the party.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 35: A group of segments identifying a contact and its communications related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department within a party.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 36: A group of segments to identify required documents.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to identify a document required of, by or for the party.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 37: A group of segments to specify charges associated with the party.

medi:segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify charges associated with the party.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilograms).

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 38: A group of segments to specify a reference related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference used by a party.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 39: A group of segments to identify the charge and its amount to be paid by the party.

medi:segment.name: Charge payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CPI, A segment to identify default charge methodology.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to indicate a reference relating to the CPI segment, such as charge reference number.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to indicate payment currency related to the charge methodology.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to identify the place of charge collection.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to identify the monetary amount associated with the charges.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 40: A group of segments to specify a transport service requirement and its associated details (such as applicable commercial agreement) related to the party.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment to specify a required service for the transport, such as re-icing.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a commercial agreement related to the service requirement.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate the location where the required service must be performed, such as place of re-icing.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to indicate the location where the required service must be performed, such as place of re-icing.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide any additional information related to the service requirement.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 41: SG42-GDS-SG43-SG44-SG45-SG46-SG47-SG48- SG50-SG52-SG54-SG55 A group of segments to describe the goods items for which transport is undertaken.

medi:segment.name: Goods item details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GID, A segment to identify a goods item for which transport is undertaken. A goods item can be identified by up to three levels of packaging.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions relating to the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment to specify a temperature setting for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Range details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RNG, A segment to specify a temperature range setting for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Transport movement details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify a country associated with a goods item, such as country of origin, or country of destination.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount associated with a goods item, such as declared value, FOB value, etc.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment to specify article numbers.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing the identity of goods being transported.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information relating to the goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 42: A group of segments to identify different places of collection and/or delivery for the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify an address of a place of collection or delivery for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the place of collection or delivery.

medi:segment.name: Nature of cargo
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GDS, A segment to describe the nature of cargo.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 43: A group of segments to specify measurements applicable to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, applicable to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 44: A group of segments to specify dimensions applicable to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, To specify dimensions applicable to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given dimension applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 45: A group of segments to identify references to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference to a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to the reference.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 46: A group of segments to specify marks and numbers of a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment to specify marks and numbers of a good item.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment to identify a reference relating to the marks and numbers.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to identify date and time of the reference.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment to specify identifying numbers related to transport units, such as batch numbers, serial numbers, etc.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 47: A group of segments to specify documents and associated date(s) and time(s) for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to specify a document prepared for a goods item.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to associate date and time with the prepared document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 48: A group of segments to identify customs and other governmental procedures and required documents relating to the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Governmental requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GOR, A segment to indicate applicable governmental procedures related to import, export and transport of the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time related to documents and/or customs- and/or governmental procedures for the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to specify locations associated with customs- and/or governmental procedures.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seals and seal issuer associated with the customs procedure and/or customs document for the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to provide additional governmental requirements information for the goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 49: A group of segments to specify required documents by government for the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment to indicate a document required by government.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date/time related to the required document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 50: A group of segments to identify transport details and associated measurements for a goods item. This group may be repeated to indicate the different phases of the movement.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify transport details for a goods item.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 51: A group of segments to identify measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify the distribution of a goods item among the transport details.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 52: A group of segments to specify the distribution of a goods item among the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the equipment in which goods are transported.

medi:segment.name: Sequence details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, A segment to indicate the order in which cargo is stowed in a container by use of a sequence number. The lowest number indicates stowage in the front of the container with higher numbers indicating that the cargo is stowed more toward the rear door.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 53: A group of segments to identify measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of that portion of the goods item in the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 54: A group of segments to specify charge associated with the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify charge associated with the goods item.

medi:segment.name: Currencies
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency associated with a freight charge.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilograms).

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment to indicate location where a specific function will be performed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 55: A group of segments to specify dangerous goods details related to the goods item. One goods item may be in different dangerous goods classes.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the class of dangerous goods, packing group, etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify the dangerous goods technical name and to specify any additional dangerous goods information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 56: A group of segments to identify a contact to whom communication regarding the dangerous goods can be directed.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or department.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify a communication number of a person or department.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 57: A group of segments to identify dangerous goods measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of the dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 58: A group of segments to specify the distribution of the dangerous goods among the transport equipment.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to identify the equipment in which the dangerous goods are transported.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 59: A group of segments to identify dangerous goods measurements.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements of that portion of the dangerous goods in the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of equipment units to each of which the given measurement applies.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 60: SG61-SG62-SG63 A group of segments to specify equipment in which goods are transported.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to specify equipment, and equipment size and type used in the transport.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify number of pieces of equipment required.

medi:segment.name: Transport movement details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMD, A segment to specify transport movement details for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment to specify measurements, other than dimensions, associated with the equipment, such as weight.

medi:segment.name: Dimensions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DIM, A segment to specify dimensions applicable to equipment.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment to identify seal and seal issuer associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Transport placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TPL, A segment to identify transport details for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment to specify handling instructions for specified equipment.

medi:segment.name: Temperature
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TMP, A segment to specify a temperature setting for the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to specify processable supplementary information associated with the equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 61: A group of segments to specify charges associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Transport charge/rate calculations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TCC, A segment to specify a charge associated with the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Price details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PRI, A segment to specify price details such as price (e.g. 100 dollar) and unit price basis (e.g. per 1000 kilograms).

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify the number of units to which the unit price basis applies.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment to indicate the applicable reduction or surcharge percentage details.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to specify a monetary amount, such as prepaid amount, discount or total amount.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to indicate a quantity, for example actual weight, declared weight or chargeable weight.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 62: A group of segments to identify different equipment pick-up or drop-off places.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment to specify a pick-up or drop-off address.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment to indicate date and time relating to pick-up or drop-off.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 63: A group of segments to specify the attached equipment and related number of pieces.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment to identify attached or related equipment such as a chassis attached to a container.

medi:segment.name: Number of units
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQN, A segment to specify number of pieces of equipment required.
